content.question: In its pilgrimage function and in the way that visitors are intended to interact with the site, the Kaaba in Mecca is most similar to

choices.label: the Parthenon on the Acropolis of Athens
the Catacomb of Priscilla in Rome

unit.text: 7: West and Central Asia, 500 BCE - 1980 CE

topic.text: 7.2: Purpose and Audience in West and Central Asian Art

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe similarities and/or differences in two or more works of art using appropriate and relevant points of comparison.
